channel.title: 317 or 508 source?
channel.description:
Hi,
I'm trying do my first server, but i dont know witch 317 or 508 is better to start. If you know can you link good source and client. Had better if server have Gs's and maybe d claws. Besides if D claws is easily add in server.
But no "old" version rs server, like tescape.
Thjank you. :)
-Pehmis

item.title: 317 or 508 source?
item.dc:creator: @Aintaro Aintaro
item.description:
@Aintaro wrote:

317 are better, their more complete than the 508 and 525 and their easier to code, and who doesn’t love the old graphics

508 is missiing lots of packets same for 525 and the 317 is like 99% complete from packets. and 317 is more stabble, you will increase your lagg if you host 508 or 525.

317 is also better because more players play the 317 than 508 or 525.

And lots more so 317 ftw. Soon 474 if i’m ready with it =)

Read full topic

item.title: 317 or 508 source?
item.dc:creator: @Pehmis Pehmis
item.description:
@Pehmis wrote:

Thanks^^

Now i downloaded some AGSpking server: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,354559.0.html
There read than client is along, but when i run comes “Agspking server” only.
Do any know good other client?

item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

317 is the Easiest to learn from

I recon 508’s are even harder than 525

item.title: 317 or 508 source?
item.dc:creator: @johnronder johnronder
item.description:
@johnronder wrote:

Well if you want to start to LEARN how to program servers with java id say a 317, you can find any source in the tutorial section

508’s are harder and you might not understand

Read full topic
